ja505:5.4: Kvajja setu → ko nvajja seti (mr) | ko ajja setu (?)
ja505:9.4: Jīvaṃ maṃ netvā → jīvaṃ panetvā (bj, pts1)
ja505:13.4: Tasmā ahaṃ brūmi gahappatīti” →  brāhmaṇo gahapati tena hoti (sī1, pā1)
ja505:14.1: Sa → idaṃ bj, s2, s3, pts1 potthakesu
ja505:19.1: Bhuttā ca me → bhuttā me (bj, pts1)
ja505:19.2: Parivārito → parivāritā (bj, pts1) | paricāritā (mr), accharānaṃ gaṇena → accharāsaṃ gaṇena (s2, s3, pts1, mr)
ja505:27.3: Mātuñca → mātu ca (bj, s2, s3) | mātucca (pts1)
